item.title: The song of the Mother Rhinoceros
item.summary: The song of the Mother Rhinoceros (not translated), accompanied by notes on movements performed in the singing and dancing of it.
item.comments: 1) p.7956v: |han≠kass'o heard this from his mother (|xabbi-an), who was told it by her mother, 2) p.7957v: the movements of the hands in the performance of the song, 3) See also The She-Rhinoceros and her elder daughter's suitors, 4) This story is found in Book VIII-22
item.author: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)

keyword.subkw: movements performed while singing and dancing
a person of the Early Race
movements performed when singing the song of the Mother Rhinoceros
